statements: SELECT room_id, room_type, availability FROM RoomInventory ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM RoomInventory WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT room_type FROM RoomInventory WHERE room_id = 3;
SELECT room_id, room_type FROM RoomInventory WHERE room_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM RoomInventory ORDER BY room_type ASC;
SELECT room_id, room_type, availability FROM RoomInventory WHERE availability = TRUE
SELECT * FROM RoomInventory WHERE room_type = 'Suite' AND availability = FALSE
SELECT room_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM RoomInventory GROUP BY room_type ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT room_id, room_type, availability FROM RoomInventory WHERE room_type LIKE '%single%' OR room_type LIKE '%double%'
SELECT room_id, room_type FROM RoomInventory ORDER BY room_type ASC, room_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM room_inventory;
SELECT room_id, room_type FROM room_inventory WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT room_id, room_type, available FROM room_inventory ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations WHERE room_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM room_inventory
SELECT room_id, room_type FROM room_inventory WHERE available = true
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-15'
SELECT reservation_id, room_id, guest_name FROM reservations JOIN room_inventory ON reservations.room_id = room_inventory.room_id
SELECT room_id, count(reservation_id) AS num_reservations FROM reservations GROUP BY room_id
SELECT * FROM RoomInventory WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT room_type FROM RoomInventory WHERE room_id = 5;
SELECT reservation_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Reservations WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT reservation_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Reservations ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Reservations WHERE check_out_date >= '2022-11-01';
SELECT * FROM RoomInventory WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT room_type, availability FROM RoomInventory WHERE room_type = 'Single Room';
SELECT * FROM Reservations WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01' AND check_out_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM Reservations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_reservations > 1;

SELECT Reservations.reservation_id, CustomerCheckIn.check_in_date, CustomerCheckIn.check_out_date FROM Reservations JOIN CustomerCheckIn ON Reservations.reservation_id = CustomerCheckIn.reservation_id WHERE CustomerCheckIn.room_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM room_inventory;
SELECT room_number, room_type FROM room_inventory ORDER BY room_number ASC;
SELECT room_number, room_type, capacity FROM room_inventory WHERE capacity > 2;
SELECT r.room_id, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM reservations r JOIN customers c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, c.email FROM customers c WHERE c.email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT room_number, room_type FROM room_inventory
SELECT DISTINCT room_id, room_number, room_type, capacity FROM room_inventory WHERE capacity > 2 ORDER BY room_number DESC

SELECT reservations.room_id, reservations.start_date, reservations.end_date, customers.first_name, customers.last_name FROM reservations INNER JOIN customers ON reservations.customer_id = customers.customer_id
SELECT room_id, room_type, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM reservations GROUP BY room_id, room_type ORDER BY total_reservations DESC

SELECT room_inventory.room_number, room_inventory.room_type, check_ins.check_in_date, customers.first_name, customers.email FROM check_ins INNER JOIN customers ON check_ins.customer_id = customers.customer_id INNER JOIN room_inventory ON check_ins.room_id = room_inventory.room_id WHERE check_ins.check_in_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM room_inventory ORDER BY room_number ASC;
SELECT room_number, room_type FROM room_inventory WHERE is_available = true;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM hotel_customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_details WHERE payment_amount > 500.00 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM room_inventory WHERE room_type = 'Single' AND is_available = TRUE;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM hotel_customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT reservation_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_details WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT room_number, room_type, is_available FROM room_inventory WHERE room_number BETWEEN 101 AND 200;
